title: Special level (SLASH'EM)
data:
A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

*"Add ttymaps for more levels and fix some wall directions in the maps \&Medusa's Island variants(`|` vs. `-`)"*

This is a set of descriptions for all new special levels in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Mall](#Mall)

- [2 Rat level](#Rat_level)

- [3 Kobold level](#Kobold_level)

- [4 Mine king level](#Mine_king_level)

- [5 Grund's Stronghold](#Grund.27s_Stronghold)

- [6 Lawful Quest](#Lawful_Quest)

- [7 Neutral Quest](#Neutral_Quest)

- [8 Chaotic Quest](#Chaotic_Quest)

- [9 Storage room](#Storage_room)

- [10 Wyrm Caves](#Wyrm_Caves)

- [11 The Lost Tomb](#The_Lost_Tomb)

- [12 One-eyed Sam's Black Market](#One-eyed_Sam.27s_Black_Market)

- [13 Nymph level](#Nymph_level)

- [14 The Spider Caves](#The_Spider_Caves)

- [15 The Guild of Disgruntled Adventurers](#The_Guild_of_Disgruntled_Adventurers)

- [16 The Sunless Sea](#The_Sunless_Sea)

- [17 The Temple of Moloch](#The_Temple_of_Moloch)

- [18 The Giant Caverns](#The_Giant_Caverns)

- [19 New Demon Prince Lairs](#New_Demon_Prince_Lairs)

  - [19.1 Yeenoghu's lair](#Yeenoghu.27s_lair)
  - [19.2 Demogorgon's lair](#Demogorgon.27s_lair)
  - [19.3 Geryon's lair](#Geryon.27s_lair)
  - [19.4 Dispater's lair](#Dispater.27s_lair)

- [20 Frankenstein's Lab](#Frankenstein.27s_Lab)

- [21 See also](#See_also)

- [22 References](#References)

## Mall

- *Main article: [Mall](/wiki/Mall "Mall")*

The mall is located between levels 5 and 6 of the [Dungeons of Doom](/wiki/Dungeons_of_Doom "Dungeons of Doom"), and contains many shops, much like [Minetown](/wiki/Minetown "Minetown"). However, unlike Minetown, it is not guaranteed to have an [Altar](/wiki/Altar "Altar"). It has a 75% chance of being generated.

## Rat level

- *Main article: [Rat level](/wiki/Rat_level "Rat level")*

The rat level is a room-and-corridor level located between levels 10 and 11 of the Dungeons of Doom, and is home to the [Rat King](/wiki/Rat_King "Rat King"). It has a 50% chance of being generated.

## Kobold level

- *Main article: [Kobold level](/wiki/Kobold_level "Kobold level")*

The kobold level is a level where [Kroo the Kobold King](/wiki/Kroo_the_Kobold_King "Kroo the Kobold King") dwells, located between levels 11 and 12 of the Dungeons of Doom. It has a 50% chance of being generated.

## Mine king level

- *Main article: [Mine king level](/wiki/Mine_king_level "Mine king level")*

The mine king level is one level below the now-misnamed "mine's end" level.

## Grund's Stronghold

- *Main article: [Grund's Stronghold](/wiki/Grund%27s_Stronghold "Grund's Stronghold")*

Grund's Stronghold is a branch accessed by a stairway down from level 12 or 13 of the Dungeons of Doom.

## Lawful Quest

- *Main article: [Lawful Quest](/wiki/Lawful_Quest "Lawful Quest")*

The portal to the Lawful Quest is located between levels 15 and 19.

## Neutral Quest

- *Main article: [Neutral Quest](/wiki/Neutral_Quest "Neutral Quest")*

The portal to the Neutral Quest is located between levels 15 and 19.

## Chaotic Quest

- *Main article: [Chaotic Quest](/wiki/Chaotic_Quest "Chaotic Quest")*

The portal to the Chaotic Quest is located between levels 15 and 19.

## Storage room

- *Main article: [Storage room](/wiki/Storage_room "Storage room")*

The storage room is located between levels 19 and 26. It has a 66% chance of being generated. It simply contains a chest on top of a burned message in a rooms-and-corridors level.

## Wyrm Caves

- *Main article: [The Wyrm Caves](/wiki/The_Wyrm_Caves "The Wyrm Caves")*

The Wyrm Caves are accessed by a stairway down between levels 20 and 21. It has a lot of dragons.

## The Lost Tomb

- *Main article: [The Lost Tomb](/wiki/The_Lost_Tomb "The Lost Tomb")*

The Lost Tomb is accessed by a stairway down between levels 21 and 24.

## One-eyed Sam's Black Market

- *Main article: [Black market (SLASH'EM)](/wiki/Black_market_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Black market (SLASH'EM)")*

The **black market** is a [shop](/wiki/Shop "Shop") that covers most of its level and offers a wide variety of goods but charges many times the usual price for them. The portal to the black market is located between levels 22 and 23, and pets cannot enter it. **One-eyed Sam** is the [shopkeeper](/wiki/Shopkeeper "Shopkeeper"), and he is very dangerous even for a character with a full [ascension kit](/wiki/Ascension_kit "Ascension kit").

## Nymph level

The nymph level is located between levels 23 and 24. It only has a 45% chance of being generated. It is a rooms-and-corridors level containing five random n, six random objects, and two random traps. [Aphrodite](/wiki/Aphrodite "Aphrodite")'s room is on the left side and contains, in addition to Aphrodite herself, five random n, four chests, four random rings, five random gems, and four random objects.

## The Spider Caves

- *Main article: [The Spider Caves](/wiki/The_Spider_Caves "The Spider Caves")*

The Spider Caves are accessed by a stairway down located between levels 26 and 29.

## The Guild of Disgruntled Adventurers

- *Main article: [The Guild of Disgruntled Adventurers](/wiki/The_Guild_of_Disgruntled_Adventurers "The Guild of Disgruntled Adventurers")*

The Guild of Disgruntled Adventurers is located between levels 26 and 31. It has a 50% chance of being generated. It is a rooms-and-corridors level, with one bigger room containing various [player monsters](/wiki/Player_monster "Player monster").

## The Sunless Sea

- *Main article: [The Sunless Sea](/wiki/The_Sunless_Sea "The Sunless Sea")*

The Sunless Sea is accessed by a stairway down located between levels 28 and 31.

## The Temple of Moloch

- *Main article: [The Temple of Moloch](/wiki/The_Temple_of_Moloch "The Temple of Moloch")*

The Temple of Moloch is accessed by a stairway down located between levels 32 and 35.

## The Giant Caverns

- *Main article: [The Giant Caverns](/wiki/The_Giant_Caverns "The Giant Caverns")*

The Giant Caverns are accessed by a stairway down located between levels 32 and 35.

## New Demon Prince Lairs

In SLASH'EM, all of the Demon Princes have their own lairs. Below are new ones

### Yeenoghu's lair

- *Main article: [Yeenoghu's lair (SLASH'EM)](/wiki/Yeenoghu%27s_lair_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Yeenoghu's lair (SLASH'EM)")*

[Yeenoghu](/wiki/Yeenoghu "Yeenoghu")'s lair is located between levels 2 and 5 of Gehennom.

### Demogorgon's lair

- *Main article: [Demogorgon's lair (SLASH'EM)](/wiki/Demogorgon%27s_lair_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Demogorgon's lair (SLASH'EM)")*

[Demogorgon](/wiki/Demogorgon "Demogorgon")'s lair is located between levels 2 and 5 of Gehennom.

### Geryon's lair

- *Main article: [Geryon's lair (SLASH'EM)](/wiki/Geryon%27s_lair_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Geryon's lair (SLASH'EM)")*

[Geryon](/wiki/Geryon "Geryon")'s lair is located between levels 10 and 15 of Gehennom.

### Dispater's lair

- *Main article: [Dispater's lair (SLASH'EM)](/wiki/Dispater%27s_lair_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Dispater's lair (SLASH'EM)")*

[Dispater](/wiki/Dispater "Dispater")'s lair is located between levels 10 and 15 of Gehennom.

## Frankenstein's Lab

- *Main article: [Frankenstein's Lab](/wiki/Frankenstein%27s_Lab "Frankenstein's Lab")*

Frankenstein's lab is accessed by a stairway up located between levels 3 and 12 of Gehennom.

## See also

- [Mazes of Menace](/wiki/Mazes_of_Menace#SLASH.27EM "Mazes of Menace")

## References

[![This article may require revision for the next version of SLASH'EM. Click here for more information.](/images/3/38/Se7e7-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article may require revision for the next version of SLASH'EM. Click here for more information.")
